Object.hasIndexTip: Whether the object class has successfully completed the build taskã€‚ "Yes" indicates that retrieval and query will be based on the built index; "No" indicates that virtualized query will be based on it;
Object.pleaseFillCorrectAttrInfo: Please fill in correct attribute information
Object.displayKeyTip: Specify a certain attribute as the default display name of the object class, which is used for the default display of the object class in scenarios such as lists and associated references.
Object.primaryKeyTip: Used to identify unique object instances and supports composition from multiple fields. When there are duplicate data in the selected primary key fields, the values will be merged to ensure uniqueness.
Object.incrementalKeyTip: It is used to record the end position of the last data processing. During incremental building, the system will only read newly added data based on this field to avoid duplicate processing.
Object.logicPropertyTip: Logical properties are values calculated or derived through rules, rather than data stored directly in the database, such as 'discounted price' of a product or 'is active' status of a user.
Object.pleaseFillObjectClassName: Please fill in object class name
Object.onlyOneConnection: There can only be one connection line between attributes
Object.attributeAlreadyConnected: This attribute is already connected, each attribute can only be connected once
Object.indexInfo: Contains {docCount} indexed objects, occupying {storageSize} of index space
Object.dataPropertiesRequired: Please add at least one data property
Object.primaryKeyRequired: The current data attribute is not configured with a primary key. Please click on the attribute that needs to be configured and enable the primary key configuration. At least one primary key must be configured (multiple can be configured).
Object.displayKeyRequired: The current data attribute has not been configured with a title. Please select an attribute from the attribute list and enable title configuration. At least one title must be configured (multiple titles can be configured).
Object.dataAttributeConfigIncomplete: Data attribute configuration is incomplete: No primary key and title configured. Please configure at least one primary key field and one title field before submitting.
Object.noMatchingAttributesToConnect: No matching attributes found with same name and type
Object.addFieldAsNewDataAttribute: Add Field as New Data Attribute
Object.skipLogicPropertyTip: If there are no values that need to be calculated or derived through rules, you can skip this step and click [Save and Exit] in the upper right corner to complete the object class creation.
Object.clearAllDataAttributesConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all data attributes? This action cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.
